Name: maximize_completed_story_points
Description: Maximize the total number of story points from completed User Stories in a Sprint.

Name: minimize_project_budget_overrun
Description: Minimize the amount by which the project's spending exceeds its allocated budget.

Name: maximize_feature_priority_delivery
Description: Prioritize the implementation of features with the highest priority score.

Name: minimize_time_to_market
Description: Minimize the overall duration of the project, from start to end, to deliver value faster.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the achievement status of the Sprint Goal, ensuring the sprint's primary objective is met.

Name: minimize_unresolved_blockers
Description: Minimize the total number of Blockers that have a status other than 'resolved'.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average story points a team completes per sprint to improve future predictability and performance.

Name: minimize_total_task_effort
Description: Minimize the sum of effort for all tasks within a sprint to increase overall efficiency.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_value
Description: Maximize the delivery of features relevant to stakeholders with high influence levels.

Name: minimize_feature_effort_estimation
Description: Minimize the estimated effort for features to select more achievable work.

Name: maximize_worker_utilization
Description: Maximize the productive use of each worker's available time.
